content.text: I am a carpenter and I have a wife and three kids. I used to drink but I stopped five years ago. I also enjoy playing poker.
I am a horse trainer and I love working with horses. I also enjoy cooking meals with food from our garden. My favorite musician is John Denver and I was raised on a large horse ranch.
That's a lot of kids! How do you handle taking care of them all?
It can be a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding. I love seeing them grow and learn.
I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about being a horse trainer?
I love the connection I have with the horses. I also love seeing them improve and succeed.
That sounds like a great job. What's your favorite John Denver song?
My favorite song is "Take Me Home, Country Roads." I grew up listening to it on the ranch.
That's a great song. I love the line, "Almost heaven, West Virginia."
Me too! It's so beautiful there.
I've never been to West Virginia, but I'd love to go someday.
You should! It's a beautiful state.
Thanks for talking with me. It was nice meeting you.
You too! It was nice talking to you.
